variable.comment: How many pickups to start with
variable.name: pickupStartNo

variable.comment: Used to determine how many pickups are changed in a refresh
variable.name: pickupRefreshRatio

variable.comment: Actual number of pickups to place. Only set at start and is modified during gameplay
variable.name: pickupRefreshNo

variable.comment: How many money pickups are spawned each time
variable.name: moneySpawnNo

variable.comment: How many walls should be changed
variable.name: wallChangeNo

variable.comment: Used to track how many walls have been toggled in the current event
variable.name: numToggled

event-group.description: What happens at the beginning of the game
event-group.title: Setup

event-group.description: What's triggered when there's a wall toggle.
event-group.title: Wall toggle

sub-events.comment: Choose a pickup, destroy it and reactivate the spawn point.
Note that clocks do not have a ratio. It's a fixed number of 1/2.
Pause at end of game of major characters/bits
